column4: hey guys, I'm trying to uninstall zope and I am having some big problems
dzhandle prerm-product: denied removal of product `CMFFormController' from instance `plone-site' (2.7) in addon-mode `manual'
subprocess pre-removal script returned error exit status 1
I get those sort of errors for every zope package
I like wordpress better. It was easy to install and works great :)
yeah, but wordpress seems to be mainly for blogs :)
well, Its possibel to write normal pages aswell. I made it to have a statical page as frontpage and only use the blog-thing for diary/blog.  (http://leviatan.kicks-ass.org - in swedish though..)
yes, I've seen it used in that way. We need something that can be used in a professional environment
ok. I use it only for fun, so I cant speak when it comes to professional stuff i guess.
actually, it is an EXCELLENT product for personal use
